name: Infinite Century: Escape
description:
It is 100 hours before the dawn of the anticipated 22nd century. In an evacuated and soon-to-self-destruct Century Industries facility lies a robot that has attained sentience. Seeing the precarious scenario he's in, he has decided to flee.

Unfortunately, the facility is overrun with seemingly out-of-control armed robots, attacking anything in sight and will explode within an hour. The confused, newborn robot's energy supply is leaking, and will take a week's worth of repairs to fix it. Worse, it seems something ominous is happening behind the scenes.

Music by Deltapotato.

Font from here.

---

UPDATE: Fixed Level 2 Crash bug, should be working fine from here on now.
